attributes.action: Change the name of Mecca Bingo "Demand respect for sacred places"
attributes.additional_details: whose protests then at the use of the name of Islam’s Holiest city in branding a gambling led Top Rank  Organisation to drop Mecca from their commercial branding. rekindle that offence in 2018 is unacceptable in 21st Century multicultural Britain built on mutual respect and tolerance for race and religion. Nothing illustrates the mosaic of this nation and its cohesion as its NHS. Many of the NHS staff who lost their lives in the pandemic were members of Britain’s Muslim community.
attributes.background: Top Rank Organisation 2018 decision to  rename their gambling venues throughout the UK  Mecca Bingo  is at least as  deeply offensive in 2020  to the majority of Britain 2.8 million Muslims today  as it was in 1997 to the  much smaller Muslim community  of Luton

rejection.details: This is a matter for The Rank Group as a private business, not the UK Government or Parliament.
